summary: Build and deploy the RICHUAL brand website (dark luxury black/gold, commanding tone) including core marketing pages and an application-based membership form.
architectural_notes: Proposed build stack: React frontend + Motoko backend, with Internet Identity login (if needed).
known_issues: User expects a live website/URL; current outputs are prompts/copy only until the site is built and deployed.
Build/deploy pipeline encountered an AI service error during an attempted update; user requested a retry.

existing_features.title: Create a multi-page RICHUAL marketing website with the following top-level pages and navigation: Home, About RICHUAL, Programs, Membership, Ritual Philosophy, and Apply.

Apply a consistent RICHUAL visual theme across the entire site: matte black base, metallic gold primary accents, deep saffron highlight accents; bold uppercase headings; clean modern body typography; high-contrast, minimal, premium layout; overall tone should feel elite, intense, and ritualistic (not casual or commercial).

Implement the Home page content and structure with: hero headline "Enter the Order.", a primary CTA button labeled "Apply for Membership" that routes to the Apply page, and sections that introduce the concept (not a gym, initiation), display the four ranks, and show short discipline-code statements including Sanskrit terms (शक्ति, तपस्या, विकास).

Implement the About RICHUAL page to explain the philosophy, the ritual/disciplined approach, and why RICHUAL is not a normal gym, including at least the Sanskrit phrases शक्ति, तपस्या, and विकास in the page copy.

Implement the Programs page with four distinct rank sections/cards: Initiate, Warrior, Titan, and Inner Circle, each presented as a rank (not a commodity package) with concise, commanding descriptions.
Implement the Membership page emphasizing an application-based entry system, limited seats, premium positioning, and an elite feel, with a clear CTA that routes to the Apply page.

Implement the Ritual Philosophy page describing daily rituals with clearly separated sections for: morning discipline, physical training, meditation, wealth focus, and brotherhood, presented as a structured and sacred system.

Create an Apply page with a form containing the following fields: Name, Age, Current fitness level, Income goal, and Why do you want to join?; include a submit button labeled "Begin Your Transformation."

Wire the Apply form submission UI to call the backend create-application method; show a success confirmation state after submission and prevent duplicate submissions from the same UI interaction (e.g., disable the button while submitting).

Add a minimal admin-only review page (not linked from the public navigation) that displays the list of submitted applications (most recent first). Protect access using Internet Identity login and restrict viewing to a hardcoded allowlist of admin principals configured in the backend.

Generate and apply a coherent visual art direction as static assets: smoke/embers texture, subtle temple/stone texture background, and a simple RICHUAL emblem mark; use them across the site as backgrounds/accents while maintaining readability and high contrast.
Retry the previously failed build/update so the project builds successfully without the prior AI service error, and publish the updated version of the existing RICHUAL site.

After the successful rebuild/redeploy, perform a smoke test of all existing routes to confirm there are no regressions: /, /about, /programs, /membership, /ritual-philosophy, /apply, and /admin/applications.

Verify the end-to-end application submission and admin review flows still function after the rebuild: submitting an application from the Apply page persists it in the backend, and an authenticated admin can view submissions (most recent first) on /admin/applications while non-admins are blocked.

new_feature_requests.summary: Create and deploy the RICHUAL website (live, functioning site)
Implement required site pages: Home, About, Programs (Initiate/Warrior/Titan/Inner Circle), Membership, Ritual Philosophy, Apply
Build Apply/Join page form (name, age, fitness level, income goal, motivation) with submission handling
Apply RICHUAL visual/brand system to the site (matte black + gold + saffron, bold uppercase headings, smoke/sparks/temple textures, Sanskrit phrases)
Persist Apply form submissions in the backend and expose backend methods to (a) create a new application and (b) list applications for administrative review.
